Package it.polimi.ingsw.PersonalBoard.Warehouse

Class WarehouseDepots

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PersonalBoard.Warehouse.WarehouseDepots
public class WarehouseDepots
extends java.lang.Object
This Class represents the warehouse depots associated to a player

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    WarehouseDepots()
    Constructor method of this class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addResource​(Resource r, int pos)
    This method receives a resource and a position, and, after checking if the slot is free, the presence of the same resource in another shelf and the presence of different resources on the same shelf, adds the first into the array resource in the slot pointed by the second
    Resource[] getResource()
    Getter of the parameter resource
    void moveResource​(int startPos, int finalPos)
    This method receives two position, and, after checking if the move is possible on a copy, exchanges the resource present in the first with the second
    void removeResource​(int pos)
    This method removes the resource in the pointed position

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public WarehouseDepots()

  • Method Details

    • getResource

      public Resource[] getResource()
      Getter of the parameter resource
      Returns:
      a copy of the original array resource[], of type Resource[]

    • addResource

      public void addResource​(Resource r, int pos) throws PositionAlreadyOccupiedException, ResourceAlreadyPlacedException, DifferentResourceInThisShelfException
      This method receives a resource and a position, and, after checking if the slot is free, the presence of the same resource in another shelf and the presence of different resources on the same shelf, adds the first into the array resource in the slot pointed by the second
      Parameters:
      r - : type of resource to be added
      pos - : position of the array
      Throws:
      PositionAlreadyOccupiedException
      ResourceAlreadyPlacedException
      DifferentResourceInThisShelfException

    • moveResource

      public void moveResource​(int startPos, int finalPos) throws NotAdmittedMovementException
      This method receives two position, and, after checking if the move is possible on a copy, exchanges the resource present in the first with the second
      Parameters:
      startPos - : represents the first position
      finalPos - : represents the second position
      Throws:
      NotAdmittedMovementException

    • removeResource

      public void removeResource​(int pos) throws YetEmptySlotException
      This method removes the resource in the pointed position
      Parameters:
      pos - : position of the array
      Throws:
      YetEmptySlotException
